text: If you do not change direction, you may end up where you are heading.
author: Lao Tzu

text: Whether happiness may come or not, one should try and prepare one's self to do without it.
author: George Eliot

text: You can run, run, run away from a lot of things in life, but you can't run away from yourself. And the key to happiness is to understand and accept who you are.
author: Dale Archer

text: Our daily decisions and habits have a huge impact upon both our levels of happiness and success.
author: Shawn Achor

text: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

text: Vision without execution is just hallucination.
author: Thomas Edison

text: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back
author: Abraham Lincoln
